ErrorCode--> <!--SQ004001-SQ004999 are Asset ErrorCode--> <!--SQ009001-SQ009999 are Miscellaneous and Internal ErrorCode--> <element name="businessError" type="tns:BusinessErrorType"> <annotation> type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="BusinessErrorCodeType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="SQ002001"> <annotation> <documentation>Customer number is as a valid link</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> <enumeration value="SQ002021"> <annotation> <documentation>Only 1 primary customer link is allowed</documentation> </annotation> <schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.whiteclarkegroup.com/services/Calms2CMS/schema/CommonTypes" xmlns:tns="http://www.whiteclarkegroup.com/services/Calms2CMS/schema/CommonTypes" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <complexType name="SecurityAudit"> <annotation> <documentation>A common standard audit information exchanged for security purposes between client and server, avoids request/response forgery. Default entity to hold audit details of the call such as user id and time-stamp.</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="messageId" nillable="false" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element name="timestamp" nillable="false" type="dateTime"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element name="clientAppId" nillable="false" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element name="userId" nillable="false" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="authorisingUserId" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element name="clientLanguage" nillable="false" type="tns:clientLanguage"> <annotation> <documentation>The supported language for error messages.</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="codeAndDescription"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="code" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="code"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="cmsCode" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="externalCode" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="typeAndReference"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="type" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element name="reference" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="yOrN"> <annotation> <documentation>The Y-N type is used for boolean-like attributes.</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="token"> <enumeration value="Y"/> <enumeration value="N"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="clientLanguage"> <annotation> <documentation>The supported language for error messages.</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="de_DE"/> <enumeration value="en_GB"/> <enumeration value="en_US"/> <enumeration value="en_AU"/> <enumeration value="fr_FR"/> <enumeration value="zh_CN"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="ApplicationInfo"> <annotation> <documentation>Details for Tentant Information and Security Audit.</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="tenantInfo" type="tns:TenantInfo"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="securityAudit" type="tns:SecurityAudit"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="TenantInfo"> <annotation> <documentation>Tenant Information</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="tenantCode" nillable="false" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>Tenant code</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="contractNumber"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="externalContractNumber" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="internalContractNumber" type="int"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="keyValuePair"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="key" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>key of the key and value pair</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="value" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>value of the key and value pair</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="componentIdentifiers"> <annotation> <documentation>This is an external reference number used by third party system.</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="componentIdentifier" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>This is current MCU ID generated and passed from FMO during activation.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="originalComponentIdentifier" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>This is original MCU ID generated and passed from FMO during activation</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.whiteclarkegroup.com/services/Calms2CMS/schema/Address" xmlns:tns="http://www.whiteclarkegroup.com/services/Calms2CMS/schema/Address" xmlns:cmn="http://www.whiteclarkegroup.com/services/Calms2CMS/schema/CommonTypes" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <import namespace="http://www.whiteclarkegroup.com/services/Calms2CMS/schema/CommonTypes" schemaLocation="http://mkvsudfsdock11:81/calms2cms/services/Calms2CMSCustomer?xsd=xsd/CommonTypes.xsd"/> <complexType name="listOfAddressBP"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="addressBP" type="tns:addressBP"> <annotation> <documentation>Business partner address.</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="addressBP"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="addressId" type="long"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressBPId" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>The BP ID.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="addressType" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="isPrimaryMailing" type="boolean"> <annotation> <documentation/> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressStreetNumber" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>The street number.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressStreetName" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>Contains the street name or for post box addresses the post box number.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressStreetType" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>The street name.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressBuildingNum" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>The building or house number of the address record indicating the particular building in the street.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressBuildingName" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>The building name.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressSubBuildingNum" type="string"> <annotation> </element> <element minOccurs="0" name="addressCounty" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>County, region name, or area portion of an address record.</documentation> </annotation> </element> name="addressCountry" type="cmn:codeAndDescription"> <annotation> <documentation>The country code associated to the country the address is in.</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence>
